item.title: Programs
item.description: Godot Flat Palette Made with Godot Flat Palette is a program I’m making to pick out color palettes for games and modeling. It’s mainly for low poly 3D modeling, as I use that art style a lot in my games. Eventually I’m planning on letting you import 3D models into it and paint individual faces with colors from the palette. Python Bodge Script Programmed in Python Bodge Script is a programming language in it’s infancy.

item.title: Art
item.description: Renders Rhombic Dodecahedron: Inspired By: Satelite In Orbit: Torus Planet: Seussian Tentacle: Low-Poly Weapons US WWII Service Weapons: AK-47: Gladiator Weapons:

item.title: Education
item.description: College Ivy Tech: I was enrolled in Ivytech Community College. My cumulative GPA is 3.4. I wasn’t seeking out any specific degree, I was just taking classes that I think would serve useful. I’ve taken Intro to Informatics, A+ Cert Prep Hardware/Software, Web Development, Intro to Entrepreneurship, and Entrepreneurial Marketing. I’ve taken a break from college though to work on game development. But now I’m returning for a CS degree in an online college.

item.title: Games
item.description: Overview : Here is a list of some of the games I’ve made , you can find some of them on my Itch.io page here https://linkipoo.itch.io. Though I have worked on many other projects, I’m still populating this website. They were all made using the Godot game engine. Massacre Demo, Map Editor Notable Features Save/Load System Undo/Redo System Brush Resource System, Including Polygonal And Star Brushes With Resizing. Video ⠀ 2D Craft Demo Notable Features Save/Load system In-depth player controller Very easy to implement more block types with different collision shapes Infinite world generation using simplex noise Gameplay ⠀ USSR - The Forgotten Game Jam, Full - Release Notable Features Event triggers Checkpoint triggers Horror atmosphere Gameplay ⠀ Galactic Gardener Demo Notable Features Planetary gravity Save/Load system Simulated economy for crop prices Crop system with light dependany growth Day/Night cycle depending on position on planet Multiple planets that simulate plant growth while loaded or not Tool system Gameplay ⠀ Tempus Para Game Jam, Full - Release Notable Features Reversing time Enemies that utilize navigation meshes Logic gate puzzle system, using levers, buttons, and wires Gameplay
